They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto

Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

Follow them as they go on exciting adventures together, exploring the lake and having fun on its sandy shorelines. Learn about the different everyday objects and colours while introducing your children to new multi-sensory activities.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Helping young viewers to develop their initial problem solving and decision making skills as well as developing their social skills makes Dinoland the perfect combination of fun and learning. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Zoo
programme.desc: One friendly zoo keeper wants you to come along and meet all the exciting animals hes looking after, and learn a few things on the way, too! This cartoon for young children, encourages them to recognise and name a variety of animals, acquire basic vocabulary, and associate the sounds animals with the sounds that they make.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: The Way We Travel

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. programme.title: Happy Garden

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: The Shapies

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Margo and Felix

programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Holiday
programme.desc: Join the children as the enjoy their holiday visiting the lake in these silent animated shorts. Follow them as they go on exciting adventures together, exploring the lake and having fun on its sandy shorelines. Learn about the different everyday objects and colours while introducing your children to new multi-sensory activities.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Planet Jumpers
programme.desc: Planet Jumpers is a series set in the future, in space. Through the everyday life of the siblings Luna and Lou we get to know different planets, funky futuristic objects and places while developing the socialization skills of our preschooler viewers.

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Vehicles
programme.desc: In this bright, stimulating cartoon, young children can learn how many different modes of transport work. Not only will they widen their knowledge on transport, they will be entertained and engaged throughout. As is the case with many Duck TV productions, the aim is to entertain and educate. Children will also be encouraged to identify shapes and colours, essential for development.

programme.title: India
programme.desc: Want an adventure? Join an Indian boy and his elephant as they travel and explore their own country, visiting the market place and meeting new people! Designed for young audiences to experience various adventures, vibrant colours, smooth animation and music aids children to develop their thinking and observational skills, as well as stimulating their senses!

programme.title: Safari
programme.desc: Children can learn about the various wild and not-so wild animals from this well beautifully illustrated safari related programme. It goes on to explore each animals habitats within the environment it lives in but also studies their behaviour. This will provide children with a real insight into animals they already know and some that they may not and include facts that are not always provided.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue
programme.desc: Bell and her trusty friends Fido the Kangaroo and Lilo the Bear come to the rescue in the forest for anybody that needs it! Doll Team to the Rescue teaches the importance of social skills, friendship and treating animals with love and respect.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Galaxy Tourists
programme.desc: Galaxy Tourists is out of this world. Following the stories of a trusty space-travelling rocket and his planet-discovering captain, this show is all about the friendship building expeditions and adventures of this space exploring pair. In classic Duck TV style this show stimulates the senses of its young audience and encourages creating thinking and imagination.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Young viewers can develop their social skills and learn about the value of friendship whilst experiencing lots of different adventures. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. They will also observe how they operate, which will allow them to grow an understanding of how they may be used in everyday life, as they see their different parts and hear the noises they make.

programme.title: Sea Adventure
programme.desc: Gentle animation set to music. Sea Adventure follows the lives of two lively little fish who are growing up in their natural environment. This show can be used to help teach toddlers new vocabulary.

programme.title: Beaver Family
programme.desc: This cartoon is designed for very young children. It shows the relationships of a beaver family, and how they go about their everyday lives. This programme has educational benefits, as long as serving to keep young children entertained. This programme is designed to enhance social skills, and develop child-parent relationships, too. It also promotes interaction between parent and baby.

programme.title: Bathroom
programme.desc: Join the little yellow duckling and her big elephant friend as they have endless fun splashing around in the Bathroom. Aimed at the littlest of viewers, this show includes the classic educational values of Duck TV, helping the development of motor skills and sensory activity. But most importantly, Bathroom helps it little viewers to befriend bath time, showing them how much fun a bath can be!

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Mini Fairy Tales
programme.desc: Join the princess, the dragon, the fairies and the elves on their adventures in this mini-series of all your favourite fairy-tales. Designed with education and creativity, Mini Fairy Tales ensures to bring your childs imagination to life, encouraging parents to get involved and participate in telling stories your young ones! Come on an adventure and join in with the fairy-tale!

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Oli - The Cycles of Nature
programme.desc: Give your child a head start, in a way thats fun and exciting, too. Oli the elephant will teach your child to identify objects and their uses in everyday life, develop their thinking and observational skills, and also he will promote an interest in nature. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid the development of young children.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Enchanting Sights
programme.desc: Colourful moving geometric shapes, which should enable your child to learn the names of basic shapes. The shapes spin and spiral around the television screen. This enchanting display is accompanied by soothing music. This programme is not only designed to help children in learning the names of shapes, but it allows them to experience colours and music, too, nurturing your childs imagination.

programme.title: Miyu and Litto
programme.desc: Miyu and Litto want you to come on their latest adventure! This is a Duck TV production, designed to both entertain and educate young children. Problem solving and decision making are key to the success of their adventures, along with their trusty colour wheel, too. Will you be able to apply skills of logic and reasoning to help Miyu and Litto in their adventures?

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. Walking around and talking to your child about what you are seeing is the best way for them to learn, but City Life is a great introduction for learning about different everyday places, developing social skills, and introducing toddlers to basic objects.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Panni and Fanni
programme.desc: Panni and Fanni the two fairies draw their own versions of a sample picture to help toddlers to develop skills such as associating objects with their shapes and colours and stimulating imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Sport, Sport, Sport
programme.desc: Learning about sports has never been more fun! This exciting animated show teaches us all about different kinds of exercises, physical activity and sports, promoting the benefits of being healthy and encouraging its young viewers to expand their hobbies by exploring new sports. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: We Bought a Zoo
programme.desc: We Bought a Zoo (2011) is a family comedy-drama directed by Cameron Crowe and starring Matt Damon and Scarlett Johansson. The family of Mee spends their last dime on a house with an old abandoned zoo. To save its inhabitants from extinction, the whole family will have to make a great effort. In order to reopen the zoo to the public, they will renovate it completely with the help of the zoo staff lead by an attractive 28-year-old woman named Kelly Foster.

programme.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2
programme.desc: Animation, with the voices of Bill Hader, Anna Faris and Will Forte. A clever scientist gets hired by his idol, the great Chester V, after he invented a machine that turns water into food, but he soon discovers that his creation is still in action but now creates animal/vegetable hybrids.

programme.desc: In this episode: 1) TO CATCH versus TO CATCH UP; 2) TO CRASH versus TO RUN INTO; 3) BEAUTIFUL versus HANDSOME.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby
programme.desc: The Great Gatsby (2013), directed by Baz Luhrmann, is a visually stunning adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgeralds classic novel about wealth, love, and illusion in the Roaring Twenties. The film stars Leonardo DiCaprio, Carey Mulligan, and Tobey Maguire.

programme.title: English 911
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) BARELY versus HARDLY EVER; 2) AMONG versus AMONGST; 3) PROSPECTIVE versus PERSPECTIVE.

programme.title: English 911
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) ATTRACTIVE versus ATTRACTED; 2) SHALL versus SHOULD; 3) EAT versus DINE.

programme.title: English 911
programme.desc: In this episode: 1) QUESTION versus ASK; 2) COACH versus TRAINER; 3) GROCERIES versus PRODUCE.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: Time has changed, as well as the things that surround us. Some things have disappeared forever, some have been transformed beyond recognition and others have begun to have different uses. In this episode, curious facts from the history of chairs.

programme.title: Norm of the North: Keys to the Kingdom
programme.desc: NORM OF THE NORTH: KEYS TO THE KINGDOM (2018). When Norm returns to New York, he is falsely accused of a crime and must work with his pals to get the case dismissed while also protecting his kingdom in a winner-take-all hockey tournament.

programme.title: Here and There
programme.desc: Here and There is an educational programme that reveals interesting facts and tells about different events. The host of the programme uses easily understandable language. The viewers at these levels have no difficulty in following the presenters speech. The show can help you boost your vocabulary.

programme.title: Here and There
programme.desc: Here and There is an educational programme that reveals interesting facts and tells about different events. The host of the programme uses easily understandable language. The viewers at these levels have no difficulty in following the presenters speech. The show can help you boost your vocabulary.

programme.title: Easy Talk
programme.desc: How often does a family manage to find a TV programme that suits everyone if everyone has different interests? And there is only one remote control! The characters in this episode had to find an answer to this question.

programme.title: Wrongandright
programme.desc: WrongandRight _ is a series of short animated videos that will show you the most common mistakes in English grammar, phonetics and vocabulary and help you avoid them in your own speech.

programme.title: English United
programme.desc: Creative American teacher and blogger Luke Priddy introduces the intricacies of the American English and the cultural specifics of the United States.

programme.title: 3Ways2: Apologise
programme.desc: 3Ways2 is a programme for those who are keen to master various stylistic layers of the English language to express thoughts appropriately depending on the situation.

programme.title: English In Focus: Idiomatic expressions with the noun "Plate"
programme.desc: The project "English in Focus" is aimed at specifying the shades of meaning and usage peculiarities of various confusing lexical units and grammar constructions.

programme.title: The Great Gatsby

programme.title: Art Land: Translucent fish
programme.desc: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream _ all of these can be used to create masterpieces of childrens art.

programme.title: Art Land: Fish
programme.desc: Did you know that you can create pictures not only with paints? Plasticine, sand, flour, and even… shaving cream _ all of these can be used to create masterpieces of childrens art.

programme.title: Sunny Songs
programme.desc: Fun songs with simple vocabulary are a great way to learn English. Numerous repetitions and a lively rhythm will help girls and boys from 2 years old to memorize the words. But even older children will enjoy following the adventures of the characters in the animated clips of the project.

programme.title: Crafty Hands: Picture frame
programme.desc: Little inventors will be able to enrich their vocabulary and make a toy for their very own collection. In this episode, were going to make a picture frame.

programme.title: Joan (suç Patronu)
programme.desc: Birleşik Krallıkın en unlu kadın mucevher hırsızı Joan Hanningtonın gerçek hikayesinden ilham alan, fakirlikten usta elmas hırsızlığına uzanan bu yolculuk 1980lerde Londrada yaşananları anlatır.

programme.title: Agatha Christienin Marpleı
programme.desc: Amator dedektif Bayan Jane Marpleın bir çok cinayet gizem macerasına katılın; oldukça analitik bir zihne sahip olan Marple bir şekilde etrafındaki gizemli suçları ve cinayetleri kendine çekiyor gibi gorunuyor.

programme.title: Murdoch Gizemleri
programme.desc: 1890lar: Murdoch, şehrin en korkunç cinayetlerinden bazılarını çozebilmek için donemin en radikal forenzik tekniklerini kullanıyor. Bunların arasında parmak izi ve kanıt takibi de bulunuyor.

programme.title: Dedektif George Gently

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Futbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turkiye Super Ligi, Turkiyenin en yuksek profesyonel futbol ligidir. Bu lig 1957de kuruldu ve şu anda 18 kulupten oluşuyor. Puan tablosunu birinci sırada tamamlayan takım, UEFA Şampiyonlar Ligi grup aşamasına doğrudan yerleşiyor.

programme.title: Sağlı Sollu
programme.desc: Utku Gorkem Kırdemir moderatorluğunde yayınlanan Sağlı Sollu programı, Asalet Salgınoğlu, Huseyin Akçar, Yucel Yenilmez ve Hakkı Kutlu katılımıyla gerçekleşiyor..

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Gune hoş bir başlangıç yapmak ve gunceli yakalamak istiyorsanız hafta boyunca ekrana gelen Kanal 7de Sabahı sakın kaçırmayın.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Mustafa Karataşla Muhabbet Kapısı
programme.desc: Manevi hayatı şekillendiren konularda akıllara takılan sorular, İslamda birlik ve beraberliğin onemi, aile hayatında dikkat edilmesi gereken noktalar, gunluk yaşamda karşılaşılan sorunlar her hafta Nursel Tozkoparanın soruları, Prof. Dr. Mustafa Karataşın sohbetiyle Muhabbet Kapısında ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Golgenin Kıyısında
programme.desc: Gucun ve entrikanın golgesinde kalan Falak ve Taimoorun sınavlarla dolu hikayesi "Golgenin Kıyısında" hafta içi her gun 14:15te Kanal 7de.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Haber Saati
programme.desc: Tumer Doğrunun sunumuyla ekrana gelen Kanal 7 Haber Saati, Haber Merkezinin guçlu ekibi tarafından hazırlanırken gundemdeki gelişmelere ayrıntılı ve en doğru şekilde yer veriyor. Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan en son gelişmeleri, siyasetin nabzını sıcağı sıcağına Kanal 7 Haber Saati aracılığıyla izleyiciye aktarıyor.

programme.title: Gir Dunyama
programme.desc: Sevilmek için kalbini ortaya koyan Kuhu ve gorduğu guzelliğin peşinden suruklenen Rajeevin çarpıcı hikâyesi Gir Dunyama ile hafta içi her gun 21:15te Kanal 7de.

programme.desc: Gune hoş bir başlangıç yapmak ve gunceli yakalamak istiyorsanız hafta boyunca ekrana gelen Kanal 7de Sabahı sakın kaçırmayın.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: 5N 1K
programme.desc: Gundemin one çıkan başlıklarını onemli konuklar ve ozel haber dosyaları ile farklı bir açıdan ele alıyor. Kimi zaman sahadan kimi zamansa studyodan bildiriyor. Bir taraftan gundemin nabzını tutarken bir taraftan da gundemi belirliyor.

programme.title: Kuzey Guney
programme.desc: Kuzey ve Guney, pusuladaki iki farklı yon gibi, karakterleri ve hayalleriyle de farklı iki kardeştir. Birbirlerine olan bağlılıkları dışında tek ortak noktalarıysa, babaları Sami’nin işlettiği simit fırınına sığamayacak kadar buyuk hayallerinin olmasıdır. Ancak iki kardeşin hayallerinin gerçeğe donuşebilmesi için kaderlerini de değiştirmeleri gerekecektir.

programme.title: Öyle Bir Geçer Zaman Ki
programme.desc: Hikaye, 1967 yılında, İstanbul’un eski semtlerinden birinde başlayan ve gunumuze kadar surecek olan bir zamanı dilimini içeriyor. 1960lı yıllarda, kocasının kendisine yaptığı onca kotuluğu ve yaşadığı aile dramını unutamamış, bir evladını torununun doğumunda kaybetmiş bir annenin ve aynı zamanda kendisine ait bir konfeksiyon atolyesinin sahibi olan Cemilenin, kızları Berrin ve Aylin; oğulları Mete ve Osman, kayınvalidesi Hasefe Hanım, damatları ve torunları ile verdiği mucadeleye tanık olacaksınız.

programme.title: Neler Oluyor Hayatta
programme.desc: Yorumlarıyla fark yaratan Hakan Ural ve Nur Tuğba Namlı, gundeme ve insana dair her konuya değiniyor.

programme.title: Yaprak Dokumu
programme.desc: Butun hayatını beş çocuğuna iyi bir ahlak vermeye adayan Ali Rıza Bey, bir haksızlığa goz yumması istenince kaymakamlık gorevinden istifa eder. Kızları Neclanın da universiteyi kazanmasıyla Ali Rıza Bey ve ailesi İstanbula yerleşmeye karar verir. Fakat Ali Rıza Bey, doğup buyuduğu şehri çok değişmiş bulur. Bu farklı çevrede çocukların istekleri de değişmeye başlamıştır. Buyuk şehir hayatının getirdiği ekonomik krizler kaçınılmazdır. Ali Rıza Bey, ekonomik gucuyle birlikte otoritesini de kaybetmiştir. Darbeler ardarda gelir. Ruzgar sert esmekte, ağacın yaprakları birer birer dokulmektedir...

programme.title: Gelinim Mutfakta
programme.desc: Aslı Hunelin sunumuyla ekrana gelen Gelinim Mutfakta, yine çok kazandırmaya devam ediyor. Gelinler her gun 1 çeyrek altın kazanırken, haftanın en başarılı gelini ise 10 altın bileziğin sahibi oluyor.

programme.title: Aşk-ı Memnu
programme.desc: Çocukları ve uzak akraba çocuğu Behlul ile İstanbul’un en onemli yalılarından birinde yaşayan Adnan Bey, Firdevs Hanım’ın kızı Bihter’le yıllar sonra tekrar karşılaştıktan sonra, unuttuğu duyguları yeniden hatırlamaya başlar. Firdevs Hanım çok hırslı bir kadındır. Kızlarıyla rekabet halindedir. Kızı Bihter, babasının olumunden sorumlu tuttuğu annesine kin duymakta ve onun kızı olarak anılmaktan buyuk utanç duymaktadır. Bihter, Adnan Bey’le karşılaştığında onun guvenli elini tutar ve yeni hayatına doğru yurumeye başlar. Bihter, Adnan Bey’in koşkunde mutluluğu ararken, tutkuyla tanışır. Behlul ve Bihter birbirlerine doğru suruklenirler. Yasak aşkları bu ailedeki herkesi ayrı ayrı etkileyecektir.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Ana Haber, Deniz Bayramoğlu’nun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Kayanın Nadimle birlikte geçirdiği kaza herkesi derinden sarsarken, Sadakat bir kez daha evlat acısıyla sınanır. Babasına yapılanların ardından kontrolunu kaybeden Demir, hesap sormak uzere Cihanın karşısına çıkar.Nare ve Şahin, onlerindeki tum engeller kalkınca evlenmeye karar verir. Gizlice çıktıkları bu yol onları mutlu sona ulaştıracak gibi gorunurken, karşılarına surpriz biri çıkar.Cihan, Boranın katilini yakalamanın rahatlığını yaşarken, Alyadan gelen bir haberle hayatlarının yeniden tehdit altında olduğunu fark eder. Olayı çozmek için harekete geçenCihan, bu kez Minenin darbesiyle sarsılır. Yaşananların ardından Alya, hem kendisi hem de oğlu için bir karar almak zorunda kalır.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Eşref, Nusreti oldurerek tum duşmanlarına gozdağı verir. Durumun ciddiyetini anlayan Kadir, artık maskesinin duşmek uzere olduğunu hisseder. Eşrefle yuzleşme vakti geldiğinde ise, bunun her şeyi yoluna koymak için son şansı olduğunu fark eder. Öte yandan, Eşrefe olan takıntısı doruk noktasına ulaşan Çiğdem, her şeyi alt ust etmeye hazırlanır. İhanete tahammulu kalmayan Eşref, Nisanla ilişkilerini kokunden değiştirecek beklenmedik bir hamle yapacaktır.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.desc: Hikaye, 1967 yılında, İstanbul’un eski semtlerinden birinde başlayan ve gunumuze kadar surecek olan bir zamanı dilimini içeriyor. 1960lı yıllarda, kocasının kendisine yaptığı onca kotuluğu ve yaşadığı aile dramını unutamamış, bir evladını torununun doğumunda kaybetmiş bir annenin ve aynı zamanda kendisine ait bir konfeksiyon atolyesinin sahibi olan Cemilenin, kızları Berrin ve Aylin; oğulları Mete ve Osman, kayınvalidesi Hasefe Hanım, damatları ve torunları ile verdiği mucadeleye tanık olacaksınız.

programme.title: Neler Oluyor Hayatta
programme.desc: Yorumlarıyla fark yaratan Hakan Ural ve Nur Tuğba Namlı, gundeme ve insana dair her konuya değiniyor.

programme.title: Yaprak Dokumu
programme.desc: Butun hayatını beş çocuğuna iyi bir ahlak vermeye adayan Ali Rıza Bey, bir haksızlığa goz yumması istenince kaymakamlık gorevinden istifa eder. Kızları Neclanın da universiteyi kazanmasıyla Ali Rıza Bey ve ailesi İstanbula yerleşmeye karar verir. Fakat Ali Rıza Bey, doğup buyuduğu şehri çok değişmiş bulur. Bu farklı çevrede çocukların istekleri de değişmeye başlamıştır. Buyuk şehir hayatının getirdiği ekonomik krizler kaçınılmazdır. Ali Rıza Bey, ekonomik gucuyle birlikte otoritesini de kaybetmiştir. Darbeler ardarda gelir. Ruzgar sert esmekte, ağacın yaprakları birer birer dokulmektedir...

programme.title: Gelinim Mutfakta
programme.desc: Aslı Hunelin sunumuyla ekrana gelen Gelinim Mutfakta, yine çok kazandırmaya devam ediyor. Gelinler her gun 1 çeyrek altın kazanırken, haftanın en başarılı gelini ise 10 altın bileziğin sahibi oluyor.

programme.title: Aşk-ı Memnu
programme.desc: Çocukları ve uzak akraba çocuğu Behlul ile İstanbul’un en onemli yalılarından birinde yaşayan Adnan Bey, Firdevs Hanım’ın kızı Bihter’le yıllar sonra tekrar karşılaştıktan sonra, unuttuğu duyguları yeniden hatırlamaya başlar. Firdevs Hanım çok hırslı bir kadındır. Kızlarıyla rekabet halindedir. Kızı Bihter, babasının olumunden sorumlu tuttuğu annesine kin duymakta ve onun kızı olarak anılmaktan buyuk utanç duymaktadır. Bihter, Adnan Bey’le karşılaştığında onun guvenli elini tutar ve yeni hayatına doğru yurumeye başlar. Bihter, Adnan Bey’in koşkunde mutluluğu ararken, tutkuyla tanışır. Behlul ve Bihter birbirlerine doğru suruklenirler. Yasak aşkları bu ailedeki herkesi ayrı ayrı etkileyecektir.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Ana Haber, Deniz Bayramoğlu’nun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Eşref Ruya
programme.desc: Eşref, çocuk yaşta yetim kalmanın verdiği yalnızlıkla suç dunyasına itilmiş ve yıllar içinde suç dunyasında hukum suren bir kimliğe burunmuştur. Onun için yetimler, kaybettiği ailesinin yerine koyduğu kardeşleri gibidir. Ancak bu aile, suç dunyasının ortasında var olmaktadır. Bir yanda yeraltı orgutlerinin başında olmak gibi ağır bir sorumluluk taşıyan Eşrefin diğer yanda hep istediği huzur arayışı bitmiyordur. Karşısına beklenmedik bir anda çıkan Nisan ise onu tahmin edilemeyecek bir ruzgarın içine surukleyecektir.

programme.title: Poyraz Karayel
programme.desc: Aşkın ve nefretin, dostluğun ve duşmanlığın, iyiliğin ve kotuluğun en uçlarda yaşandığı bir hikaye...

programme.title: Kuzey Guney
programme.desc: Kuzey ve Guney, pusuladaki iki farklı yon gibi, karakterleri ve hayalleriyle de farklı iki kardeştir. Birbirlerine olan bağlılıkları dışında tek ortak noktalarıysa, babaları Sami’nin işlettiği simit fırınına sığamayacak kadar buyuk hayallerinin olmasıdır. Ancak iki kardeşin hayallerinin gerçeğe donuşebilmesi için kaderlerini de değiştirmeleri gerekecektir.

programme.title: Sinema
programme.desc: Çeşitli film turleri veya dizileri aracılığıyla onumuzdeki dakikalarda eğlenecek ve rahatlayacaksınız. Filmler hem genç hem de yaşlı izleyiciler için, hepimiz için gosterilir.

programme.title: Dizi Kuşağı
programme.desc: Bir sonraki bolumu tatmin edici bir beklenti ve istekle izleyebilmeniz için dizi size belirsizlik ve kuçuk bir doz coşku verecektir.

programme.title: Dizi Kuşağı

programme.title: Gizem Çetin ile KRT Ana Haber
Gizem Çetin ile KRT Ana Haber
Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Hollywood Surusu Goçebelerin liderleri Avaya acımasız saldırısıyla sarsılmıştır. Ava zayıftır ve avlanamaz. Avanın acısını katmerlendiren ise, aç haldeki surusunun onu bir kenara atmasıdır. Ama o olmadan suru avlarını alt etmede zorluk çekmektedir.

programme.title: Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Goçebe surusundeki aslanlar MK surusunun topraklarına tam kalbinden saldırırlar. Surudekiler çil yavrusu gibi dağılır, beş yeni MK yavrusuna yaklaşmaları tehlikeyi artırır. Bu arada Hollywood surusu toparlanır, Avanın sağ kalma gucu hala yuksektir.

programme.title: Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Kurak mevsimde su seviyeleri azalınca, Kimba ve Maya adlı kardeşler nehri geçerek anne-babalarını aramaya çıkarlar. Afrikadaki en yoğun timsah ve suaygırı topluluklarının arasından geçerek, diğer tarafta daha da buyuk tehlikelerle karşılaşırlar.

programme.title: Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Kurak mevsimin son birkaç haftasında, suru, kalan tek su kaynağı olan nehre yakın durmaktadır; ama Luangwada yakınlık tehlike demektir. Özellikle de suaygırı avının kokusu Hollywood surusunu nehri geçmeye teşvik ettiği için durum tehlikelidir.

programme.title: Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Tumu dişilerden oluşan Hollywood surusu dort Goçebe erkek kardeşin saldırısından sonra surgundedir. Ancak liderleri Ava, ailesini, Goçebelerle hesaplaşmak için, onlara ait olan sahanın merkezine, guneye yonlendirmeye karar verir.

programme.title: Yavru Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Hayvanlar alemindeki tum yavrular iyi bir anneye sahip olamaz. Ancak bunlar, her şeyi annesinden oğrenen halka kuyruklu lemurdan, annesinin kucaklamalarına doyamayan minik orangutana kadar, şanslı olan hayvanların oykuleri.

programme.title: Tuhaf, Vahşi ve Harika
programme.desc: Afrikayı dolaşarak oradaki hayvanların renkli, ilginç hayatta kalma stratejilerine bir goz atın. Gosterişli flamingolardan kaybolan kertenkelelere kadar bu tuylu, pofuduk ve pullu sihirbazların her şeye rağmen yiyecek bulma, yırtıcılardan kurtulma ve eş bulmalarına tanık olun.

programme.title: Ağaçkakanlar Kovuğun Hikayesi
programme.desc: Eşsiz bir kuş ailesinin çıkardığı ritmik vurmalı seslerle ilerleyin. Buyukten kuçuğe doğru sıralanan, dunyanın 239 ağaçkakan turunun, neden doğanın en iyi oduncuları olduğunu oğrenin; uçma, tırmanma ve arama becerilerini keşfedin ve gizli yuvalarının içine bir goz atın.

programme.title: Kuzey Amerikanın Derinlikleri
programme.desc: En tehlikeli Atlantik maceralarından birinde Lizzieye eşlik edin ve boğa kopekbalıklarıyla serbest dalış yapın. Aç timsahlar, kurnaz kaplumbağalar ve minik ama kuvvetli plaj fareleriyle dolu Meksika Korfezinin gerçek dışı kıyılarında keşfe çıkın.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim bir grup gladyatoru Afrika savanlarındaki bir su birikintisine getirdiğinde değerli kaynaklar uzerindeki çatışmalara tanık olun. Aslan ve fil arasındaki bolge kavgasını, bir termit tepesine yapılan karınca baskınını ve bir bal porsuğunun olumcul bir yılanla yaptığı riskli dansı gorun.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Avustralyanın en zeki gladyatorlerine ve etkileyici cephaneliklerine karşı mucadele edin. Kangurunun olumcul boks hareketleri ve kırmızı sırtlı orumceğin hassas muhendislik urunu tuzakları gibi silahların iklim değişikliğinin tahribatından kurtulmalarına yardımcı olup olamayacağını oğrenin.

programme.title: Keşfedilmemiş Manzaralar
programme.desc: British Columbiada bulunan Vancouver Adasının batı yakasındaki hırçın Pasifik Okyanusuna seyahat edin. Dağlardaki buzulların zirvelerinden Kanadanın yegane yağmur ormanlarının kubbelerine kadar, doğa ve insan ruhu goz kamaştıran yaşam alanlarında bir arada var olurlar.

programme.title: Orangutan Orman Okulu
programme.desc: Üçuncu grubun sular altında kalan dersliğini ziyaret eden ikinci grup suda eğlenceli anlar yaşıyor. Ayu, Ruthie ve Kesi serbest kalmaya bir adım daha yaklaşıyor. Dunyanın en nadir orangutanı olan Albanın gelişi, Orangutan Orman Okulunda sansasyon yaratıyor.

programme.title: Tuhaf, Vahşi ve Harika
programme.desc: Afrikayı dolaşarak oradaki hayvanların renkli, ilginç hayatta kalma stratejilerine bir goz atın. Gosterişli flamingolardan kaybolan kertenkelelere kadar bu tuylu, pofuduk ve pullu sihirbazların her şeye rağmen yiyecek bulma, yırtıcılardan kurtulma ve eş bulmalarına tanık olun.

programme.title: Yavru Hayvanlar
programme.desc: Kurklu fokların binlerce yavruyu doğurmalarını izleyin. Siyah ayı yavruları arkadaşlarıyla boğuşuyor, mirket yavruları da işleri paylaşarak aralarında bağ kuruyorlar. Tum bunlar hayvanlar aleminde buyumenin kalabalık olunca kolay olduğunu kanıtlıyor.

programme.title: Kuzey Amerikanın Derinlikleri
programme.desc: Sıkıca giyinin ve buzların ağır, huzunlu yok oluşuna tanıklık etmek için, kopekbalıklarının peşinden kuzeye çıkan Lizzieye katılın. Avlanma alanları azaldığı için bir kasabayı yağmalarken yakalanan kutup ayılarına ayı hapishanesinde eşlik edin.

programme.title: Golgeli Topraklar
programme.desc: Yeni Zelandanın guneydoğu kıyısı dunyadaki en zengin balık avlama bolgelerinden biridir. Burası genç deniz canlılarının çaylaklıktan bağımsız yetişkinliğe geçiş yeridir. Yavru balinalar, yunuslar ve foklar burada avlanmayı oğrenirler, toplumun kurallarına alışırlar ve kendi maceralarına atılırlar.

programme.title: Makro Dunyalar
programme.desc: Gunduzler soğumaya başlar başlamaz, koyu renkli bocekler kırlardan ve çayırlardan uzaklaşmaya başlarlar. Hummalı vızıltıları yavaşça azalır ve nihayet tamamen yok olur. Tum havyanlar kışın sağ kalmak için kendi ozel yontemlerini uygular. Kırlangıçlar ve turnalar gibi goçmen kuşlar guneye uçarken, geyik gibi birçok memeli kalın bir kış postuna burunerek sıcak yerlerde saklanır ve uykuya dalar. Peki ya bocekler ne yapar? Neden tumu baharda geri doner?

programme.title: Afrikanın Vahşi Ufukları
programme.desc: Ruzgar, su ve ateşin asırlar boyu oyarak şekil verdiği, kayalık bir doğa parçası Guney Afrikadaki Cederberg Dağları. Bu heybetli zirveler inanılmaz çeşitlilikteki bitkilerin ve hayvanların evi. Ama burada, golgelerde kol gezen, her an saldırmaya hazır, gizliliğini koruyan varlıklar da var.

programme.title: Orangutan Orman Okulu
programme.desc: Albino orangutan Alba geldiğine gore, onun sınıf arkadaşları buna nasıl tepki verecekler? Ayrıca, anaokuluna da goz atarak, Beninin buyuk bir zorbayla nasıl başa çıktığını gorun ve girişken dişilerin yeni hiyerarşide yerlerini nasıl bulduklarını izleyin.

programme.title: Gladyatorler
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim bir grup gladyatoru Afrika savanlarındaki bir su birikintisine getirdiğinde değerli kaynaklar uzerindeki çatışmalara tanık olun. Aslan ve fil arasındaki bolge kavgasını, bir termit tepesine yapılan karınca baskınını ve bir bal porsuğunun olumcul bir yılanla yaptığı riskli dansı gorun.

programme.title: Buyuk Kediler Ülkesi
programme.desc: Goçebe surusundeki aslanlar MK surusunun topraklarına tam kalbinden saldırırlar. Surudekiler çil yavrusu gibi dağılır, beş yeni MK yavrusuna yaklaşmaları tehlikeyi artırır. Bu arada Hollywood surusu toparlanır, Avanın sağ kalma gucu hala yuksektir.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

programme.title: Hızlı Ayaklar
programme.desc: Ali, normal bir okulda okurken yetenek tarama testine katılır. Bu test sonucunda Alinin fiziksel ozellikleri ve yetenekleri sayesinde, iyi bir eğitim de alarak olimpiyat branşlarında yarışabilecek seviyede olduğu anlaşılır. Ardından spor okuluna alınır. Burada ust duzey fiziksel yeteneklere sahip arkadaşlarıyla tanışır vemacera başlar.

programme.title: Sonic Boom
programme.desc: Kirpi Sonic, Miles Tails Prower, Ekidne Knuckles ve Amy Rose, Dr.Eggmanın planlarını durdurmaya çalışırken antik bir tapınak bulurlar. Sonic iyi bir şey yapacağını sanarak Lyrici serbest bırakır. Lyric Kaos Kristallerini alıp robot dunyası yapmak istemektedir. Sonic, Kristallerin bir kısmını toplar. En son Lyric dunyanın bir kısmını robotlaştırır ama Sonic ona engel olur. En sonunda Sonic Lyrici yener.

programme.title: Mondoyan
programme.desc: Birbirinden çok farklı uç kahraman Yan Dunyası’nı korumak için seçiliyor. Üstad Saku’dan aldıkları eğitimle Yan Dunyası’nı ele geçirmeye çalışanlarla mucadele ediyor. Baharın koruyucusu April, Guneş’in koruyucusu Xia ve Ruzgarın koruyucusu Pai guçleri ve yetenekleriyle hiç kimseye goz açtırmıyor. Bazen sakarlıklarıyla komik duruma duşseler de ekip olmanın gucuyle her tur durumdan sıyrılmayı başarıyorlar.

Bu test sonucunda Alinin fiziksel ozellikleri ve yetenekleri sayesinde, iyi bir eğitim de alarak olimpiyat branşlarında yarışabilecek seviyede olduğu anlaşılır. Ardından spor okuluna alınır. Burada ust duzey fiziksel yeteneklere sahip arkadaşlarıyla tanışır vemacera başlar.

programme.title: CoComelon - JJ İle Lezzetli Yiyecekler!
programme.desc: CoComelon - JJ İle Lezzetli Yiyecekler!

programme.title: Avrupanın Muhendislik Harikaları
programme.desc: Bu seri, Avrupa’nın muhendislik harikalarının olağanustu sırlarını ortaya çıkarıyor. Altı buyuk ulkede çekilen yapım; rekor kıran inşaat projelerini, yenilikçi makineleri ve araçları, dahiyane tasarımları keşfedecek. Ayrıca Avrupa’nın en ikonik simgelerini ayakta tutan gizli muhendislik çozumlerini ve bunların bugun de çalışmasını sağlayan insanları gozler onune serecek.

programme.title: Batı Cephesi: Son Perde
programme.desc: Nazi Almanyasının çokuşunden 80 yıl sonra, Batı Avrupanın kurtuluşunu modern gozlerle deneyimliyoruz. Hayatta kalan arşivlerin eşsiz restorasyonu ve uzman renkli hale getirilmesi, bizi duygusal ve vurucu bir hikâyeye taşıyor. Bu hikâye, kahramanlık ve trajediyi, umut ve umutsuzluğu dengeleyerek, kimseyi dokunulmaz bırakmayan ya da değiştirmeyen bir vahşetle yapılan savaşın gerçekliğini gozler onune seriyor.

programme.title: Oklahoma City Saldırısı: Amerikada Bir Gun
programme.desc: 19 Nisan 1995te Oklahoma City, ABD tarihinin en yıkıcı teror saldırılarından biriyle sarsıldı. Alfred P. Murrah Federal Binasına yapılan saldırı 168 can aldı, yuzlerce kişiyi yaraladı ve tum ulkeyi derinden etkiledi. Saldırının 30. yılında, Oklahoma City Saldırısı: Amerikada Bir Gun belgesel serisi, o kara gunu bizzat yaşayanların gozunden aktarıyor. Hayatta kalanlar, ilk mudahale ekipleri ve bolge sakinleri, acı, kayıp ve cesaret dolu hikâyelerini paylaşıyor.

programme.title: Oklahoma City Saldırısı: Amerikada Bir Gun

programme.title: Araba S.O.S
programme.desc: Otomobiline tutkuyla bağlı olan pek çok insan vardır ancak her guzel şeyin bir sonu olduğu gibi otomobillerin de bir omru var. Usta tamirci Fuzz ve sunucu Tim Shaw, sahipleri tarafından oldukça değer verilen eski otomobilleri eski gorkemli gunlerine kavuşturmak için kolları sıvıyor. Otomobiller sahiplerinin haberi olmadan, gizlice, son derece iyi donanımlı bir tamirhaneye goturulerek uç haftalık zahmetli bir çalışmanın ardından usta ellerde yeniden yaratılıyor. Fuzz ve Tim, bu bakımsız klasikleri, yollara dondurebilmek için zamana karşı yarışıyorlar. Finalde ise otomobil sahibini buyuk bir surpriz bekliyor…

programme.title: Batı Cephesi: Son Perde
programme.desc: Nazi Almanyasının çokuşunden 80 yıl sonra, Batı Avrupanın kurtuluşunu modern gozlerle deneyimliyoruz. Hayatta kalan arşivlerin eşsiz restorasyonu ve uzman renkli hale getirilmesi, bizi duygusal ve vurucu bir hikâyeye taşıyor. Bu hikâye, kahramanlık ve trajediyi, umut ve umutsuzluğu dengeleyerek, kimseyi dokunulmaz bırakmayan ya da değiştirmeyen bir vahşetle yapılan savaşın gerçekliğini gozler onune seriyor.

programme.title: Geleceğe Doğru
programme.desc: Bir zamanlar bilim kurgu olarak algılanan şu anda gerçek olmaya doğru gidiyor. 6 bolumluk belgesel serisinde National Geographic insanoğlunun bir milyon yıl sonra nasıl olabileceğini ongormeye çalışıyor. Gunumuzun en başarılı bilim insanları, gelecek bilimcileri, uzmanlar ve bilim kurgu yazarları izleyicileri insanoğlunu geliştirecek ve hatta yapısını değiştirecek en yeni teknolojilerin, fikirlerin ve yeniliklerin içine sokuyor. Geleceğe doğru tipik bir Amerikan ailesinin gozunden insanlığın kaderinin ve geleceğinin nasıl olduğunu izleyiciye aktarıyor. Ailenin kızının android olduğu belgesel insanlık sırrının en ucra koşelerine giderek yapılan seçimler, gelinen nokta ve insanoğlunun uzun yıllar sonra donuşeceği yapıyı sorguluyor. Bu belgeselde insan makine ile birleşiyor, zeka sınır tanımıyor ve en onemlisi insanoğlu gezegenlerarası yaşam formuna kavuşuyor.

programme.title: Geleceğe Doğru
